name: Crazy Animals
short_description:
An idea page for a Free and open-source, cross-platform Multiplayer Online Battle Arena written in the Torque2D

Progress: Discontinued idea. May come back to it one day and I would need to learn how to use Torque2D first!

Ideas
Will originally target Ubuntu desktop
Mutated animals with special powers (disease).
Power-hungry - gain extra power on defeating turrets and must beat opposing power source to defeat opponents.
1 lane
Options of teams are 1v1 to 10v10

Roadmap (Main.Feature.BugFix.Build [Date])
0.1 - Character moving on map
0.2 - Turrets, small power sources (inhibitors), large power source (Nexus)
0.3 - Mobs and autoattacks
0.4 - Character's abilities
0.5 - One character for each class
0.6 - Character bots (mostly for testing)
0.7 - At least 2 characters for each class
0.8 - Peer-to-peer connections
1.0 - Stats (collection)
1.1 - Music
1.2 - German translation
1.x - More animals (1 for each class per 1.x release)
summary: Free MOBA written in the Torque2D
